text:
Selamat datang di Toko Resmi TNW Tech 🧡🧡🧡
✅ Semua Barang READY STOCK di Tangerang
✅PENGIRIMAN CEPAT dalam 24 JAM
✅Dropshipper/Agen/Reseller dipersilakan
✅KEPUASAN DIJAMIN 100% -Jika Anda tidak puas dengan item di toko kami dengan alasan apapun, silahkan hubungi kami, kami akan segera memberi solusi dalam waktu 12 jam
✅ Ikuti toko kami untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak kejutan!
----------------------------------------------------------
【soundcard Portabel Berfitur Lengkap】Perangkat ini menggabungkan sound card, mikrofon, dan headphone menjadi satu, merekam sambil mendengarkan, dan dilengkapi dengan 6 mode suara, reverb akustik / multi-grade, 12 jenis suara efek khusus, dan remote control gratis untuk mengoperasikan efek suara, untuk memenuhi kebutuhan perekaman kapan pun, di mana pun, cocok untuk berbagai skenario seperti live streaming, vlog,kelas online, dan wawancara.
【Penerima 3-in-1】sound card leher dilengkapi dengan penerima 3-in-1: adaptor iPhone, adaptor TYPE-C, adaptor kabel audio kamera 3.5mm, kompatibel secara luas dengan berbagai perangkat, colokkan dan gunakan, mikrofon leher secara otomatis dipasangkan setelah mikrofon dihidupkan, menggunakan pita digital 2.4 GHz dan mode omnidirectional, memiliki kemampuan transmisi yang stabil, jarak transmisi dapat mencapai 80m.
trans:
Welcome to Official Store TNW Tech 🧡🧡🧡
✅ All items are READY STOCK in Tangerang
✅ FAST DELIVERY in 24 HOUR
✅ Dropshipper/Agent/Reseller are welcome
✅ GUARANTEE for 100% SATISFIED - If you are not satisfied with our selling items, whatever your reason is, please get in touch with us, and we will give you the solution in 12 hour
✅ Follow our store to get more surprises!
----------------------------------------------------------
[Portable soundcard with complete features] This device combines a sound card, microphone, and headphones in one device, recording while listening. It has 6 sound modes, acoustic reverb / multi-grade, 12 special sound effects, and a free remote control to operate sound effects. Meeting recording needs whenever and wherever. It's compatible with various scenarios like live streaming, vlogs, online classes, and interviews.
[3-in-1 receiver] The Sound card neck is equipped with a 3-in-1 receiver: iPhone adaptor, TYPE-C adaptor, cable adaptor of camera audio in 3.5 mm, compatible with many devices widely, plug in and use, the neck microphone paired automatically after the power is on, using 2.4 GHz digital ribbon and omnidirectional mode, having a stable transmission ability, transmission range reaches 80m.
